main.name: Jack Bonatakis
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Manager, Data Engineering
work.description: I managed and served as tech lead for all data warehousing efforts at Rhino. I worked cross-functionally to coordinate closely with our Business Intelligence, Data Science, Risk, Finance, Product, and Engineering teams. Additionally I supported our data ingestion, data distribution, data ops, and analytics enablement teams as needed. Selected Tech Stack: Python, Airflow (GCP Cloud Composer), BigQuery, dbt, Docker, Stitch, Cloud Functions, Cloud Run, Cloud Build, Terraform

work.title: Senior Data Engineer
work.description: I built some cool software, written primarily in Python and deployed via Terraform in AWS (GovCloud). Lambda functions, ECS/Fargate, API Gateway, managing networking/IAM, Glue, Athena, DynamoDB, and more.

work.title: Associate Analytics Consultant
work.description: Built data pipelines, models, and reports using Apache Airflow, GCP, AWS, Snowflake, BigQuery, Fivetran, Looker, Python, and more.
